name: Trove - Infinium Chef Pack
detailed_description:
“Save a turkey, eat some sushi” is the motto of the Infinium Chef, who loves whipping up tasty alternatives to… himself, basically.

INCLUDES
Infinium Chef Ally
SS Tekka Boat (w/ Wonderful Wave Sail)
5 Tasty Mounts
  • Takeout Takoyaki
  • Oversized Okonomiyaki
  • Tasty Taiyaki
  • Mobile Miso Bowl
  • Ramen Rider
2 Nifty Styles
  • Dripping Dango
  • Hearty Hachimaki
Delicacy Dealer Costume

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista 32-bit Service Pack 2
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX @ 2.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics driver: OpenGL 3.2 or DirectX 10.0

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.7.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Additional Notes: Two button mouse
